name: Shades of Death
description:
Shades of death is a program with a dark graphic style and droll scenario.

You seek to find your way out from the world you were thrown to and 
come across an awesome story along your way.

Features:
-A mesmerizing visual style including cool animation, 2D art
-A great story line which involves you into the game.
-An Adventure type of platformer.
-You can speed run and have fun.

Requirements:
-This game runs on fairly low-tier hardware.
 If you're experiencing poor performance, try changing the quality settings to Low, reducing the screen resolution, and turning off Ambient Occlusion and Anti-Aliasing.

-Tested in Windows 10,7
-Coming Soon for mac
